name: Pear and Goat Cheese Salad
description: A simple, sweet and tangy salad of spring mix, sliced pears, goat cheese medallions, spiced candied walnuts, and grapes. Served with a side of citrus vinaigrette.
reviews: Goat cheese was phenomenal - the pears weren't ripe :(
Wilted nasty lettuce. Two tiny slices of pear. The goat cheese is pretty good though.
